Before you ally yourself with a faction, you must know your heart's desire.

Is gold your aim? Then the Free Traders Collective may be your best match. Perhaps you prize physical prowess, in which case you have something in common with the Iron Order. Or is your reputation what you value most? The Enlightened Union has a place for you.
What is your heart's desire? Money? Power? Companionship?
Alas, I can only accept applications from guild masters.
The day will come when we choose our leaders based on boldness, bravery, or wisdom. Which do you value most?
